sentence.Network_en: Patronage of the arts comes from businesses and private individuals.
sentence.Network_cn: 对艺术的资助来自企业和个人。

sentence.Network_en: Though it was not yet noon, there was considerable patronage.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然时间未到中午, 店中已有许多顾客惠顾.

sentence.Network_en: He has a great deal of patronage in his hands.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆法_百度文库 ... (drain 排干) patronage n 赞助,惠客 anchorage n 停泊地.

剑五词汇_百度文库 ... monument 纪念碑 patronage 保护人，保护 distraction 分心.

list.abs: 从社会的高层到低层，政治庇护(political patronage)变得如此普遍，以致于不仅可以从官员，也可以从太监和皇室寻求庇护。结果，就 …
...样，则为选择动机由电视机和錄放影机中选择ㄧ样惠顾动机 (patronage motives) 规律而重复地到同ㄧ家店购买的动机每天下课后 …
...规政治”（informal politics）和“裙带政治”（ patronage politics）。
在20世纪以前，美国在很长时间内实行政治分赃制(patronage system)：当选的行政首脑根据竞选过程中的贡献大小分配政府职位，因 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from patron 'protector, advocate' (see patron)

entry.def: Patronage is the support and money given by someone to a person or a group such as a charity.

example.ex: ...government patronage of the arts in Europe...
example.tran: 欧洲政府对艺术的资助

example.ex: The Vevey Festival was founded 12 years ago under the patronage of Oona Chaplin.
example.tran: 沃韦喜剧电影节是12年前在乌娜·卓别麟的赞助下设立的。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of providing approval and support;

sentences.sentence: "his vigorous backing of the conservatives got him in trouble with progressives"

means.word_mean: 3. a communication that indicates lack of respect by patronizing the recipient
4. (politics) granting favors or giving contracts or making appointments to office in return for political support
5. the business given to a commercial establishment by its customers;

sentences.sentence: "even before noon there was a considerable patronage"

means.word_mean: 1. support by being a patron of
2. be a regular customer or client of;

sentences.sentence: "Our sponsor kept our art studio going for as long as he could"

auth_sentence.content: Composers have had a famously stormy relationship with patronage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Composers have had a famously stormy relationship with patronage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Composers have had a famously stormy relationship with patronage.

auth_sentence.content: Walpole consolidated Whig power through a system of royal patronage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Walpole consolidated Whig power through a system of royal patronage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Walpole consolidated Whig power through a system of royal patronage.

auth_sentence.content: Thank you for your continued patronage at Staples.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thank you for your continued patronage at Staples.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thank you for your continued patronage at Staples.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态

sentences.en: We give our patronage to local shops.
